Sauna Request

# Book a mobile sauna rental and we'll deliver right to your backyard or
event.

## Experience what sauna can do for your mind, body, & soul.

Rent a Sauna

## Relaxation  
Awaits You.

Stonegrove Saunas is dedicated to bringing traditions of physical, mental and
spiritual wellness to your home and community. Our handcrafted barrel saunas
provide an authentic experience that has the power to relax, heal, and
rejuvenate. No matter what the weather its always a good time to Sauna.

__ Play Video

### We Deliver.

When you rent one of our mobile saunas, we deliver it right to your home,
cabin, or event venue. We can place the sauna trailer in your yard, driveway,
alleyway apron, or any other flat area accessible by a vehicle.

## 6-Person Saunas

Minneapolis

__ Previous

__ Next

  * __ Minneapolis, MN

### 6-Person Barrel Sauna​

Request to Book

____ Pricing

  * 1 Night:     $285
  * 2 Nights:   $425
  * 3 Nights:   $300
  * 4 Nights:   $740
  * 5 Nights:   $855
  * 6 Nights:   $940
  * 7 Nights:   $995

____ Delivery & Details

  * Nightly minimums may apply. Review our policy here.
  * Free delivery within 10 miles of sauna location. Add $3/mile after that.
  * Includes 2 bundles of wood and dunk tank.
  * Ideally placed on a flat 9×20 ft. area.

____ Cancellation Policy

  * 14 days or more prior to delivery, 25% of deposit non-refundable
  * 7-13 days prior to delivery, 50% of deposit non-refundable
  * 2-6 days before delivery, 75% of deposit non-refundable
  * Day before or day of delivery, full deposit non-refundable
  * All refunds are at the discretion of Stonegrove Saunas.

Dunk Tank

The cold plunge is an essential element of sauna. We include a 75 gallon dunk
tank with each rental.

Cedar Barrel Sauna

Our Western Red Cedar barrel saunas are custom made to go anywhere. Available
with 4 or 6 bench seats.

2x Firewood Bundles

Two firewood bundles is enough for two sauna sessions. Additional bundles
available for $10 each.

Essential Oils

Upgrade your package with essential oils, like Eucalyptus and Birch, to clear
your mind and soothe your muscles.

## Everything  
you need for an authentic sauna experience.

Each rental includes our classic Western Red Cedar wood-fired barrel sauna, a
75gal dunk tank, 2 bundles of firewood, and water buckets. Optional upgrades
include essential oils and additional firewood.
